# Create a workflow
In this section you create a workflow in your project area.

* Go to the project homepage
* Click on `New workflow`
<center><img src="images/Click_on_new_workflow.png"></center>\

* Name the workflow "Crabs workflow"
<center><img src="images/Name_workflow_Crabsworkflow.png"></center>\

* Click `OK`

<center><img src="images/View_workflow_empty.png"></center>

You now have an empty __workflow__ titled "Crabs workflow".

* Right click in the middle of the empty page and select `Add`

<center><img src="images/Rightclick_on_workflow_add.png"></center>


* Click on `Table`

<center><img src="images/Click_on_table.png"></center>\

* Select the Crabs data
<center><img src="images/Click_on_crabsdata_workflow.png"></center>\

* Click on `OK`

A box will appear in the workflow, we consider each box a __step__ in your data analysis process.
A new step named "Crabs data" will appear in your workflow.\
<center><img src="images/View_workflow_data_added.png"></center>

* If the step's name is not correct or descriptive: Select the box, right click and select `Rename`

You have now successfully imported the crabs data set into the projects workflow. In the next section you visualize the data using __projections__.
